data.title: Until Dawn: Rush of Blood
data.meta_description: From the warped minds of the team behind PS4 horror classic Until Dawn, comes Until Dawn: Rush of Blood  a virtual reality experience to strike fear into the hearts of every trigger-happy arcade shooter fan. Arm yourself to the teeth then blast your way through a horde of enemies and monsters coming at you from all angles. Duck and dodge everything thats thrown at you in this fright-filled rollercoaster ride from hell  exclusive to PlayStation VR. Can you survive seven levels of pure terror to top the global leaderboards? With multiple paths to take and nightmarish themes to scare the living daylights out of you, no two rides will ever be the same  and neither will you...
